event.title: 7/14: BASTILLE DAY WINES, CHEESES & GAMES party in Harajuku
event.catch: Come and celebrate the Bastille Day in style!
event.description:
Come and celebrate the Bastille Day in style!
7 wines from the South of France will be available
You can drink as much as you want till 6pm
A generous Cheese canapes selection on freshly baked French baguette will be presented
Several fun games to win wine and cheese pri…zes!

Price: 4,980yen:
Advance reservation: 3,980yen ( Payment either on credit card or by bank transfer at least 7 days before )

Foreigners get an additionnal 1000yen back at the door
( please show your ID )
only available for the first 20 foreigners who sign up on line

Details and payment:
English: http://www.wineandcooking.info/en/specialevent.html
Japanese: http://www.wineandcooking.info/jp/specialevent.html
